translation.en: and the damn thing is, they hook you in…

translation.en: like killing people like you.

translation.en: Tricia!

translation.en: Oh, boy.

translation.en: Let's see, it's Saturday night, right? I know exactly where she is.

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: What's it gonna be?

translation.en: I have a proposal for you and, uh, it's gonna sound a little strange.

translation.en: You're under arrest, you sick fuck.

translation.en: I wasn't soliciting prostitution. I swear to God, I wasn't.

translation.en: You know what they do to pedophiles in the joint, Delany?

translation.en: Not to mention hamster fuckers.

translation.en: I wasn't looking for a hooker or a hamster!

translation.en: -[sobbing] -How do you know her name?

translation.en: We were at a wedding once, a long time ago.

translation.en: And… And you hooked up with a friend of mine, Kyle Brenner.

translation.en: Doesn't ring any bells.

translation.en: So what? What do you want with her?

translation.en: It's stupid. It was a bad idea. I'm sorry. Can I please just apologize and go?

translation.en: I want to hear it.

translation.en: I go to Vegas. Three little words!

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, something's missing. Get your butt out of that little thing.

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: Tricia?

translation.en: Tricia! Oh, God, I knew it!

translation.en: Oh, how could you?

translation.en: Consuela. Kelly… Tricia!

translation.en: Oh, you're all dirty birdies!

translation.en: You want to join us?

translation.en: Thank God Almighty!

translation.en: Oh, come on.

translation.en: If you don't cut, I'm gonna cum.

translation.en: You know. Those three little words.

translation.en: [Michael] Uh, okay, I love you.

translation.en: -I love you. I love you. -[laughing]

translation.en: -I love you. I said it. -No.

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[man 1] Yeah, baby.

translation.en: [man] Hold it, Bob.

translation.en: -[man 2] In unison, turn. Okay? -[man 3] Two, three.

translation.en: -[man 1] C mark. -[man 2] Action!

translation.en: You're under arrest, you sick fuck!

translation.en: So you can get a clear future of our vision together.

translation.en: Wash my car.

translation.en: [man] Marker.

translation.en: That's quite a story. What happened to her? She might've been the love of my life.

translation.en: [woman] Energy and pace.

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -I'm… [laughs]

translation.en: Oh, Michael.

translation.en: -Call me. -[chuckling] Okay. I will.

translation.en: Don't get too comfortable.

translation.en: -You have got to wait your turn. -Hurry up, I'm next.

translation.en: -Jesus Christ! What the hell is this? -[all laughing]
